mapper.select: /* 문화누리카드 전체 조회 */ SELECT m.MUNHWACARD_NUM, m.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, m.CVC, m.CARD_PW, m.CARD_EXPIRYDATE, m.CARD_COMP, m.CARD_USABLE_CHECK, m.FIRST_USAGE_AMOUNT, m.LAST_USAGE_AMOUNT, m.CARD_ISSUE_DATE FROM MUNHWACARD AS m INNER JOIN USER_INFO AS u ON m.USER_ID = u.USER_ID;
/* 카드 번호 중복 여부 검색 */ SELECT COUNT(MUNHWACARD_NUM) FROM MUNHWACARD WHERE MUNHWACARD_NUM = #{munhwaCardNum};
